author: bob bart
comment: Seriously.  It's one thing to have ads in the app but then you take over my home screen.  Forget it.  Textra is way better and no stupid adds.  I am glad I did not pay for the pro version

reply.author: SMS & MMS Team
reply.content: Ads help keep our app running, so we could offer you more cool features for free. Thank you for your understanding. You can purchase your Pro version in Settings of Messages. It's totally ad-free and will offer more amazing features in future. Thank you for your continued support to us!  We really appreciate that 🤗

author: Robert Chupinka
comment: Every single theme says not available after I paid for the stupid pro version… waste of money.   Download one that works!!!  If they start to work I'll change my rating!!

author: Roxy Rodriguez
comment: I'm only writing this review because I felt obligated to do so. I just installed this app a few days ago since my default sms is on the fritz. I understand there are going to be a lot of ads etc. However, it tried to take over other functions of my phone. Such as lock screen settings. I was asked to review the app and I selected to do so later. Immediately after rejecting to review/rate the app I am being bombarded with "failed message" notifications to messages that do not exist. For this very reason I selected to have notifications for every message delivered. This continues to happen. I just haven't deleted the app because I need to use my sms until I find a better app.

author: Kia Chavis
comment: I'm missing messages, some of them are coming in and some are not. And if I uninstall the app my entire message history goes with it.. There is no way to get my messages to show in the texting message app on my phone. If I ever get a way to export my message to the original app on my phone I will uninstall. Frustrating and very inconvenient

author: christina mayes
comment: I am not able to send pictures? Every time I try I just get a msg that says "cannot sent message now, too many unsent MMS messages."

I really like this app it does what other apps do and its way like my friends could understand what I'm saying when I'm like in a hurry I just type it a little similar to the word I actually mean and it would actually put the word I'm thinking of I just love this app I give it a five star and lots of thumbs up!

author: John Diamond
comment: This needs to be fixed and inproved nothing works right on it themes is a complete mess too this needs a lot of work purchased full version still add what wrong with these people

comment: Way too many ads.... Jeez even opening up a message creates an ad.
I used it for a total of 5 minutes before my phone was overwhelmed with pop-ups and ads. That's just not for me. Guess I'll stick to the free messaging that was on my phone
There's a lot of men faking they are Facebook Friends. Who are Beautiful Woman. Just wanting fraudulent money

author: Louise Maurice
comment: It dies the job. The adverts are a little intrusive but, I imagine necessary. I would like it better if it would also include gifts.

author: Heather Stearns
comment: Just paid to get the upgraded version so it would be ad free and I cannot get rid of a notification of 'messages not sent'. Very frustrating.

author: Roxana Sanchez
comment: Horrible ! paid for the pro and no picture messages come through and the annoying failed messages continues to display.

author: Jennifer Cherry
comment: Way to many ads!!!!!! It would be a lot better without the ads and I shouldnt have to pay to get the updated version where there are no ads
This is all so new to me, but I love being able to keep in touch with my family and friends.
It's all about technolgy..  keep it up AND YOU WILL ALWAYS HAVE A CUSTOMER ..SUPER

author: Bo Bo
comment: Would have been a five star but way too many ads other than that great app...

author: Alyssia Gray
comment: Its Ben taking forever to send my message told me upgrade to pro for add free I did still tons of adds ..so what did I pay for???

reply.author: SMS & MMS Team
reply.content: Sorry for inconvenience. If you get a receipt from google? If not, you might do not buy the pro version successfully. If yes, could you please logout and relogin again to see if it works? If this issue is still here, please contact us via gmail. We'll help you ASAP.

author: Amereen Begum
comment: Only one sim msgs can be sent if in 1st sim msgs gets cmpltd then v cn use 2nd sim msgs but here it ud highly impossible

author: Chiquita Mason
comment: I really like how you can change the theme and that I can combine all my messages in one...but there is too many add. I recently uninstalled the Facebook messenger for this messenger which I didn't get adds st all. So you get 4 stars for now.

Do you read your reviews? First being, how many reviews stated that they were deleting cuz of adds? Bad choice guy. If less adds equals continued customer and more choice to entice customer to pro then you still have that customer. But you don't have that choice once they delete app. Its strange you want to make your money from add customers and not cuz of a quality product when you indeed have such. That's called greedy and not proud of your product. Don't be greedy and in time Your product will stand on its own with lots of customers and less adds. Number two issue is I have to stop to let the texting catch up. And I'm not even the fastest typer. Its very frustrating. If I'm excited or even angry and therefore passionate about what I'm texting to someone, I don't want to have to stop...wait...for...the...words...I...text...to...catch...up...get it? Number three, when I choose a theme, should it not over ride any background pic I formerly decided to choose? The theme pops up on the keyboard and the boarder of background wallpaper behind the messages but the pic I had chosen as my wallpaper prior to the theme remains. It looks choppy as they are nowhere close to being anything of the same topic. If I can't get this resolved I will not keep app as I'm all about the visuals. Last but not least, when I'm composing a msg, the keyboard stays on top of the msg. I cannot see what I'm typing. Why? I'm a terrible typed and must review what I'm composing. I shouldn't have to minimize the keyboard to do this. I have never had to do so until I added your app.

author: Crystal Callaham
comment: Love it just haven't had time to figure it out yet all the way. I'm using a tablet and I'm hoping to use it like a text app because my tablet has service

author: Annette Taylor
comment: Great for seeing everything together. BUT... I DON'T LIKE THAT IT ABSORBS EVERYTHING IN YOUR PHONE! And KEEPS! Might delete. There are too many data sniffers now!

comment: U get 5when it doesn't take 20mins to send picture message other than that awesome app
Yes I like the new bring-your-own-device program to SafeLink and I went by Mom Android and yes I'm learning everything and if I don't get it right, let you know and that app

author: Ave to Damascus
comment: Can do without the hoops to get into using the app..can also do without the inflated amount of apps

reply.author: SMS & MMS Team
reply.content: Sorry for inconvenience. We'll fix this issue in the future. Please give us some time and we will offer you a better msg app. Thank you for your continuous supporting. We really appreciate that. Hoping we can gain you back after we fix this issue.

comment: One of the best apps I've come across that doesn't have to many ads and works like it's supposed to unlike almost all the other apps I've downloaded that I get so frustrated with I uninstall it immediately
